name: RetroQuest: Los pergaminos de la sabiduría
name_original: RetroQuest: Los pergaminos de la sabiduría
description:
Thanks for playing my very first game for the ZX Spectrum!

It´s a simple platform game in which you have to beat some ugly monsters, recover the Wisdom Scrolls, get the wrench, repair the arcade controller and get to the final screen. Hope you enjoy it!
